name: check_1_param
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool eu_vat_number_checker.
Tool description: The EU VAT Number Validation API verifies the format and validity of EU VAT numbers and retrieves company information such as name, address, country code and VAT number. It returns a detailed response.
API description: This function checks the validity of a given VAT number using the RapidAPI service.

vat.description: The VAT number to be checked, including the country code.
